text:
Onfleet | Support Engineering Manager | San Francisco, CA | Full time | Onsite

Onfleet powers last-mile delivery logistics for hundreds of companies, across 60+ countries, reaching millions of people every month.

Several of our customers have posted in this very thread. Business is good.

We're looking for a technical individual - someone who is very familiar with both databases and programming - and has a few years of technical support experience to expand and transform our support operations.

If this is you, please get in touch with us here: https://angel.co/onfleet/jobs/131122-support-engineering-man...
